exported_by: browser-phased template for relay workflow testing

tasks.title: Web Browser Engine
tasks.description: Build a web browser engine with HTML parsing, CSS styling, JavaScript execution, DOM management, layout computation, rendering, networking, and event handling. Each component goes through relay phases: explore, design, implement, test.

tasks.title: CSS Engine
tasks.description: Component for parsing CSS stylesheets, computing cascaded and computed styles, and resolving selector specificity. Handles inheritance, shorthand properties, and media queries.

tasks.title: Design: CSS Engine
tasks.description: Design the CSS engine: tokenizer, parser producing CSSOM, selector matching engine, cascade algorithm, specificity calculation. Define style struct layout and property value types.

tasks.title: Explore: CSS Engine
tasks.description: Research CSS3 specification coverage priorities, selector matching algorithms, cascade resolution rules. Evaluate approaches for computed style caching and incremental recalculation.

tasks.title: Implement: CSS Engine
tasks.description: Implement CSS tokenizer, parser, CSSOM construction, selector matching with specificity, cascade resolution, and computed style calculation. Support shorthand expansion and inheritance.

tasks.title: Test: CSS Engine
tasks.description: Test CSS parsing, selector matching, specificity calculation, cascade resolution, and computed style output. Verify shorthand expansion, inheritance, and media query evaluation.

tasks.title: DOM Tree
tasks.description: Component for the Document Object Model tree structure. Manages node hierarchy, element attributes, text content, and provides traversal and manipulation APIs used by all other components.

tasks.title: Design: DOM Tree
tasks.description: Design DOM tree data structure: node types (Element, Text, Comment, Document), arena allocator, parent/child/sibling navigation, attribute storage, and mutation API. Define interfaces for HTML parser and JS runtime integration.

tasks.title: Explore: DOM Tree
tasks.description: Research DOM specification levels, arena-based vs reference-counted tree implementations, and mutation observer patterns. Evaluate memory management strategies for large documents.

tasks.title: Implement: DOM Tree
tasks.description: Implement DOM tree with arena-based allocation, node type hierarchy, attribute maps, tree traversal iterators, and mutation methods (appendChild, removeChild, insertBefore). Support document fragment operations.

tasks.title: Test: DOM Tree
tasks.description: Test DOM tree operations: node creation, tree manipulation (insert, remove, replace), traversal correctness, attribute handling, and memory safety. Verify no dangling references after mutations.

tasks.title: Event Handling System
tasks.description: Component for dispatching and processing user and system events. Implements event capture/bubble propagation, event listener management, input event translation, and focus management.

tasks.title: Design: Event Handling System
tasks.description: Design event system: Event base type hierarchy, EventTarget interface, capture/bubble dispatch algorithm, listener storage, hit testing integration with layout, and focus/blur management.

tasks.title: Explore: Event Handling System
tasks.description: Research DOM event specification (capture, target, bubble phases), input event types (mouse, keyboard, touch, pointer), focus management models, and event delegation patterns.

tasks.title: Implement: Event Handling System
tasks.description: Implement EventTarget trait, event dispatch with capture/bubble phases, listener registration/removal, hit test coordinate mapping from layout tree, mouse/keyboard event translation, and focus management.

tasks.title: Test: Event Handling System
tasks.description: Test event dispatch order (capture then bubble), stopPropagation behavior, preventDefault effects, listener add/remove during dispatch, hit testing accuracy, and focus management transitions.

tasks.title: HTML Parser
tasks.description: Component for parsing HTML documents into a token stream and building a parse tree. Handles tag nesting, self-closing elements, character entities, and malformed markup recovery.

tasks.title: Design: HTML Parser
tasks.description: Design the HTML parser architecture: tokenizer state machine, tree construction algorithm, error recovery strategy. Define public API, data structures for parse tree nodes, and integration points with DOM.

tasks.title: Explore: HTML Parser
tasks.description: Research HTML5 parsing specification, evaluate existing parser libraries, identify edge cases (malformed HTML, character encoding, void elements). Document parsing algorithm options and constraints.

tasks.title: Implement: HTML Parser
tasks.description: Implement the HTML tokenizer and tree builder per the design spec. Handle tag nesting, self-closing elements, character entity decoding, and malformed markup recovery. Integrate with DOM tree builder.

tasks.title: Test: HTML Parser
tasks.description: Test HTML parsing against the html5lib test suite. Verify correct handling of well-formed documents, malformed markup recovery, character encoding detection, and void elements. Measure parsing performance.

tasks.title: JavaScript Runtime
tasks.description: Component for executing JavaScript code. Integrates a JS engine, provides DOM bindings, handles script loading order, and manages the event loop for async operations.

tasks.title: Design: JavaScript Runtime
tasks.description: Design JS runtime integration: engine selection, DOM binding layer, global object setup, script loading pipeline, event loop architecture, and security sandbox boundaries.

tasks.title: Explore: JavaScript Runtime
tasks.description: Research embeddable JS engines (V8, SpiderMonkey, QuickJS), DOM binding strategies, script execution ordering (defer, async, module), and event loop integration patterns.

tasks.title: Implement: JavaScript Runtime
tasks.description: Implement JS runtime: embed chosen engine, create DOM binding layer with getter/setter proxies, implement script loader respecting defer/async/module ordering, build event loop with microtask queue.

tasks.title: Test: JavaScript Runtime
tasks.description: Test JS execution, DOM manipulation from scripts, event handler invocation, script loading order compliance, and event loop behavior. Verify security sandbox prevents unauthorized access.

tasks.title: Layout Engine
tasks.description: Component for computing the visual layout of DOM elements. Implements box model calculations, block/inline flow, flexbox, and generates a layout tree with computed positions and dimensions.

tasks.title: Design: Layout Engine
tasks.description: Design layout engine: layout tree structure, box model types, block flow algorithm, inline layout with line breaking, flexbox layout algorithm. Define interface with style system and paint system.

tasks.title: Explore: Layout Engine
tasks.description: Research CSS layout algorithms: block formatting context, inline formatting, flexbox specification, box model edge cases. Study how Servo and WebKit approach incremental layout.

tasks.title: Implement: Layout Engine
tasks.description: Implement layout tree construction from styled DOM, box model calculations (margin collapsing, padding, border), block flow layout, inline layout with line breaking, and basic flexbox support.

tasks.title: Test: Layout Engine
tasks.description: Test layout calculations: box model dimensions, margin collapsing, block flow positioning, inline text wrapping, flexbox distribution. Compare output against reference renderings.

tasks.title: Networking Layer
tasks.description: Component for fetching resources over the network. Implements HTTP/HTTPS client, connection pooling, request scheduling, caching, and cookie management.

tasks.title: Design: Networking Layer
tasks.description: Design networking layer: async HTTP client, connection pool manager, request priority queue, disk cache with eviction policy, cookie jar with domain/path scoping, and resource loader API.

tasks.title: Explore: Networking Layer
tasks.description: Research HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 protocols, TLS libraries, connection pooling strategies, cache validation (ETag, Last-Modified), and cookie specification compliance requirements.

tasks.title: Implement: Networking Layer
tasks.description: Implement async HTTP client with connection pooling, TLS support, request prioritization, disk-backed cache with LRU eviction, cookie storage, and redirect following. Integrate with resource loader.

tasks.title: Test: Networking Layer
tasks.description: Test HTTP request/response handling, connection pooling behavior, cache hit/miss/validation, cookie domain scoping, HTTPS certificate validation, and redirect chains. Use mock server for determinism.

tasks.title: Rendering Pipeline
tasks.description: Component for painting the layout tree to a display surface. Implements paint order, layer compositing, text rendering, image decoding and display, and display list generation.

tasks.title: Design: Rendering Pipeline
tasks.description: Design rendering pipeline: display list generation from layout tree, paint order (background, border, content, outline), layer tree for compositing, text glyph rendering, and image display.

tasks.title: Explore: Rendering Pipeline
tasks.description: Research rendering approaches: immediate-mode vs retained-mode, GPU acceleration options, display list optimization, text shaping libraries (HarfBuzz), and image format decoding.

tasks.title: Implement: Rendering Pipeline
tasks.description: Implement display list builder, paint operations (rect, text, image, border), layer compositor, text renderer with font fallback, and image decoder integration. Support basic CSS backgrounds and borders.

tasks.title: Test: Rendering Pipeline
tasks.description: Test rendering output: paint order correctness, text glyph positioning, image display, border rendering, layer compositing. Use pixel-comparison reference tests for visual correctness.
